input.job_description:
MUHAMMAD FURQAN  
Address:  399 M, LDA Avenue One, Lahore  
Cell# 0332 -4845514 , Email: 
furqan_zaheer@hotmail.com  
 
 
Objective  _ 
Seeking a challenging position that would utilize my skills and challenge various abilities in the 
real world. Looking for an organization that offers career growth  and a chance to achieve goals 
through persistence and hard work.  
Professional  Qualification   
• Conceptually strong, articulate, extrovert and commercially  inclined.  
• Assure the timely & accurate preparation & submission of  reports  
• Strong interpersonal; communication skills with an ability to communicate with people  at 
all levels.

and can render highest standard customer service.  
Professional  Experie nce  
Dany Technologies.  
I have recently joined Dany Technologies from June 2021 till Present.  
 
Key Account Executive  (Acting  Manager)  
Supervise sales operations of sales team. 
Implement strategies to be available on all LMT’s.  
Developed the date base of LMT’s of the regi on 
from scratch.  
   Retain existing customers by providing prompt  customer  services.  
   Supervise accounts receivables team in collecting  balances.  
Supervise field marketing and sales force.  
Analyze field reports and prepare sales documents.  
Meet with customers to address concerns and provide 
solutions. Discover sales opportunities through consumer 
research.  
Present products to prospective customers.  
Conduct training in sales techniques and  company product 
attributes.  
Prepare and submit reports to the National Sales Manager.
 
 
 
Able to handle various works under pressure in a challenging & demandingenvironmentRed bull Pakistan.  
I am working in Red Bull from Oct 2020 till June 2021.  
 
 
 
 Maximize volume and revenue in key assigned food service accounts by 
 
 Responsibility to acquire new food service accounts for entire  region.  
 Activate marketplace initiatives and promotions to build brand development and 
maximize brand performance  
 Identifying market potential in order to establish new account, achieve food 
service sales volume  goals . 
 Maintain, monitor, and regularly evaluate pricing and contracts with customer s 
so as to provide products . 
 Approval and critique of promotional programs with the objective of improving 
effectiveness and efficiency in trade spending and brand consumption 
development.  
 Develops and executes effective HORECA account -specific marketing & Sales 
programs.  
 
Sigma Distributors (Pvt.) Ltd.  
I am working in this company from February 2018 till  Oct 2021. 
 
Sales & Marketing Executive  
My key responsibilities include sales & marketing of Red Rumi and Red Bull.  
Major responsibilities in Red Rumi  include:  
Overseeing and developing promotional campaigns for sale.  
Conducting research and analyzing data to identify and define audiences. 
Present products to prospective customers in HORECA sector.  
Meeting with HOR ECA Clients on daily basis.  
Identifying potential clients to establish new 
accounts in HORECA sector in region.  
Major responsibilities in Red Bull  include:  
 
 
 
of half region from scratch.  
   
   Supervise accounts receivables team in collecting  balances.  
Supervise field marketing and sales force.  
Analyze field reports and prepare sales documents.  
Meet with customers to address concerns and provide 
solutions.  
utilizing fact-based selling methods
Supervise sales operations of sales team.
Implement strategies to be available on all LMT’s and IMT's.
Developed the date base of LMT’, IMT's and GT customer
Retain existing customers by providing prompt customer services.Sales SupervisorPresent products to prospective customers.  
   Assess sales performance according to  KPIs.  
Prepare and submit reports to the Regional Sales Manager.  
Cube Discipline  
I am working in this multinational company from August 2016 till February 2018.  
Team lead Sales &  Marketing  
Major responsibilities  include  
Leads generation Management 
Managing Team  
Generating Sales Report (Daily & Monthly)  
Direct liaising with HR managers and Companies Head 
After Sales services  
Report Analysis  
TTL (Job fair, Events)  
BTL (Telema rketing, Email Marketing, SMS Marketing) 
Client Meetings  
Pakistan Telecommunication Company Ltd. (PTCL)  
1-year paid internship in marketing from Jan 2014 to Feb 2015  
Major responsibilities include  
 Comp laint Handling  
 Customer Services  
 BTL(Direct M arketing ) 
 Sales (Evo, Charji, Broadband)  
 
Warid Telecom  
I have worked in this company from 10 October 2012 to 31 January 2014.  
Customer Service Representative  
Major responsibilities include  
 Complaint Handling  
 Customer Services  
 After Sales Services  
 Telemarketing  
 
Professional Skills:  
 Time Management – work under tremendous work pressure and meet with deadlines with 
ease and efficiency  
 Enthusiastic and result oriented “Can Do” attitude  
 Can easily adjust or adopt new working environment.  
 Excellent Communication & Interpersonal Skills . 
 Expert in Computer Operating Systems, Microsoft Office 2003/2007  
Educational Background:  
   Master of Business Administration   
Major in Marketing  
NUCES -Fast 
2014 – 2015  
Bachelor of Business Administration  
Major in Marketing  
Global Institute, Lahore  
2008 – 2012  
F.Sc (Pre engineering)  
Govt. Islamia College  Civil lines, Lahore  
2006 – 2008  
Projects/Research Work:  
• Research work on “Quality of KFC zinger burger”  
• Business Plan on “Online fast-food  restaurant”  
• Marketing Plan on “Launching MP3 watch”  
 
Personal Details:  
CNIC    :  35202 -6377049 -7 
Birth date   : 14th September 1990  
Marital Status   :  Single  
Languages known  :  English, Urdu, Punjabi  
Special Skills   :  Expertise in Project management, Office administration, MS Office  
    Software and Spread sheets, Internet.  
Postal Address   :  House # 4, Street # 93 Chowk Nagina Baghban Pura Lahore.
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
5+ years of experience in business development or sales
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
